author: BBC News
title: Aleppo battle ends as Syria rebel deal reached
description: Russia says fighting ends in eastern Aleppo, as Syrian rebels agree to leave in the coming hours.

author: BBC News
title: Aleppo battle: Fighting ends in besieged city
description: Latest updates on the battle in eastern Aleppo after deal is reportedly reached for rebels to leave.

author: BBC News
title: Aleppo: George Osborne attacks 'vacuum' of Western leadership
description: George Osborne says a "vacuum" of Western and British leadership contributed to the situation in Syria.

author: BBC News
title: Southern rail and unions to hold new talks over strikes
description: Rail bosses and union chiefs agree to hold talks in a bid to resolve the long-running Southern rail dispute.

author: BBC News
title: Southern Rail chaos: Commuters video blog journeys
description: Four Southern Rail passengers video blog their mornings during the strike action.

author: BBC News
title: Nine convicted over student visa English test plot
description: Nine people are convicted of an immigration fraud linked to English language tests used for student visas.

author: BBC News
title: Migrant disaster: The wrecked boat where 700 died off Libya
description: The BBC's James Reynolds visits the boat that sank off Libya killing 700 migrants in April 2015.

author: BBC News
title: Met football abuse inquiry covers four Premier League clubs
description: Police receive 106 sex abuse allegations relating to 30 London football clubs, including four in the Premier League.

author: BBC News
title: 'Huge concern' as teen moped crime in London rises
description: Crime involving mopeds has gone up by more than 600 per cent in London in the past two years, BBC London can reveal.
